General.Name: Sunplus Innovation Technology Inc.
General.Description: Sunplus Innovation Technology Inc. researches, develops, manufactures, and markets microcontrollers and system-on-chips with embedded software solutions in Taiwan. It provides wired optical mice, wireless desktops, and MCU for HID and toy devices; and Web, NB, and IOT camera controllers. The company's products are used in human interface devices, PC external HDD/ODD drives, and PC/NB camera and industry control market segments. It also offers image data services for AI datasets, including data collection, labeling and tagging, verification, and model training; 2D bounding box; line and polygonal annotation; semantic segmentation, landmark/key point annotation; and polygonal annotation services, as well as product features tagging, data format transform, emotion analysis, data entry-data capture, training, and system integration. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan. Sunplus Innovation Technology Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Sunplus Technology Company Limited.
General.Address: A2, No.1, Li-Hsin 1st Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 300
